body:
This is because you are doing a server side move which is more like a rename of a file than a copy, so rclone doesn't cound them as bytes transferred or files transferred.

Maybe it should?

@olefrost Reading the forum thread I see you gave some feedback. Maybe you'd like to submit a PR for this @olefrost ? The fix for server side copies was here 50a4ed8fc44184788bf06fda588efe88aa9410f8 so it "should" just be a matter of modifying the server side move code like the last chunk in that commit.
@ncw Great tip, that is certainly a good starting point. I will take a deeper look after my summer vacation. It is fine with me if somebody else want to do it (before).

When somebody (perhaps myself) takes a deeper look into this, then it may be a good time to consider the different use cases. 

Perhaps it makes more sense to have separate stats for server-side operations, or a variation around this. There are some considerations in this thread: https://forum.rclone.org/t/get-real-transfer-size-and-path-for-moved-items-in-rclone-sync/25230

I'll just note that when we added the stats for server side copies it made a lot of users happy! The same might be the case for server side moves too (which are often implemented with a server side copy then a delete).

issue.title: fs/operations: add server-side moves to stats - fixes #5430

repository.name: rclone
repository.description: "rsync for cloud storage" - Google Drive, S3, Dropbox, Backblaze B2, One Drive, Swift, Hubic, Wasabi, Google Cloud Storage, Azure Blob, Azure Files, Yandex Files

issue.body:
#### What is the purpose of this change?

To show progress of server-side operations by adding server-side moves to stats.

A server-side move will then show the same stats as a server-side copy of the same file.

A server-side move/rename of a folder will (still) not count in the stats - imagine the stats after an (almost) instant rename of a top-level folder with TBytes of data.

#### Was the change discussed in an issue or in the forum before?

Issue: https://github.com/rclone/rclone/issues/5430
Forum post: https://forum.rclone.org/t/help-with-stats-logging/25023

#### Examples to illustrate the change

These examples illustrates the stats of server-side operations **before** the change:

```
./rclone copy GoogleDrive:testfolder1/testfile1 GoogleDrive:testfolder2 --log-level=INFO --stats=1s 
2021/08/04 14:17:50 INFO  : 
Transferred:              0 / 110.125 MiByte, 0%, 0 Byte/s, ETA -
Transferred:            0 / 1, 0%
Elapsed time:         4.4s
Transferring:
 *                                     testfile1:  0% /110.125Mi, 0/s, -

2021/08/04 14:17:50 INFO  : testfile1: Copied (server-side copy)
2021/08/04 14:17:50 INFO  : 
Transferred:      110.125Mi / 110.125 MiByte, 100%, 0 Byte/s, ETA -
Transferred:            1 / 1, 100%
Elapsed time:         5.0s
```

```
./rclone move GoogleDrive:testfolder2/testfile1 GoogleDrive:testfolder3 --log-level=INFO --stats=1s 
2021/08/04 14:29:38 INFO  : 
Transferred:             0 / 0 Bytes, -, 0 Bytes/s, ETA -
Checks:                 0 / 1, 0%
Elapsed time:         3.3s
Checking:
 *                                     testfile1: checking

2021/08/04 14:29:38 INFO  : testfile1: Moved (server-side)
2021/08/04 14:29:38 INFO  : 
Transferred:             0 / 0 Bytes, -, 0 Bytes/s, ETA -
Checks:                 1 / 1, 100%
Renamed:                1
Elapsed time:         4.0s
```

```
./rclone move GoogleDrive:testfolder3 GoogleDrive:testfolder4 --log-level=INFO --stats=1s           
2021/08/04 14:25:49 INFO  : Google drive root 'testfolder4': Server side directory move succeeded
2021/08/04 14:25:49 INFO  : 
Transferred:              0 / 0 Byte, -, 0 Byte/s, ETA -
Elapsed time:         2.5s
```

These examples illustrates the stats of server-side operations **after** the change:

```
./rclone copy GoogleDrive:testfolder1/testfile1 GoogleDrive:testfolder2 --log-level=INFO --stats=1s 
2021/08/04 14:17:50 INFO  : 
Transferred:              0 / 110.125 MiByte, 0%, 0 Byte/s, ETA -
Transferred:            0 / 1, 0%
Elapsed time:         4.4s
Transferring:
 *                                     testfile1:  0% /110.125Mi, 0/s, -

2021/08/04 14:17:50 INFO  : testfile1: Copied (server-side copy)
2021/08/04 14:17:50 INFO  : 
Transferred:      110.125Mi / 110.125 MiByte, 100%, 0 Byte/s, ETA -
Transferred:            1 / 1, 100%
Elapsed time:         5.0s
```

```
./rclone move GoogleDrive:testfolder2/testfile1 GoogleDrive:testfolder3 --log-level=INFO --stats=1s     
2021/08/04 14:22:32 INFO  : 
Transferred:              0 / 0 Byte, -, 0 Byte/s, ETA -
Checks:                 0 / 1, 0%
Elapsed time:         3.5s
Checking:
 *                                     testfile1:  0% /110.125Mi, 0/s, -

2021/08/04 14:22:33 INFO  : testfile1: Moved (server-side)
2021/08/04 14:22:33 INFO  : 
Transferred:      110.125Mi / 110.125 MiByte, 100%, 0 Byte/s, ETA -
Checks:                 1 / 1, 100%
Renamed:                1
Elapsed time:         4.4s
```

```
./rclone move GoogleDrive:testfolder3 GoogleDrive:testfolder4 --log-level=INFO --stats=1s           
2021/08/04 14:25:49 INFO  : Google drive root 'testfolder4': Server side directory move succeeded
2021/08/04 14:25:49 INFO  : 
Transferred:              0 / 0 Byte, -, 0 Byte/s, ETA -
Elapsed time:         2.5s
```


#### Checklist

- [X] I have read the [contribution guidelines](https://github.com/rclone/rclone/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#submitting-a-pull-request).
- [X] I have added tests for all changes in this PR if appropriate.
- [X] I have added documentation for the changes if appropriate.
- [X] All commit messages are in [house style](https://github.com/rclone/rclone/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#commit-messages).
- [X] I'm done, this Pull Request is ready for review :-)

issue.title: Transferred bytes in stats/progress includes server-side moves

repository.name: rclone
repository.description: "rsync for cloud storage" - Google Drive, S3, Dropbox, Backblaze B2, One Drive, Swift, Hubic, Wasabi, Google Cloud Storage, Azure Blob, Azure Files, Yandex Files

issue.body:
<!--

We understand you are having a problem with rclone; we want to help you with that!

**STOP and READ**
**YOUR POST WILL BE REMOVED IF IT IS LOW QUALITY**:
Please show the effort you've put into solving the problem and please be specific.
People are volunteering their time to help! Low effort posts are not likely to get good answers!

If you think you might have found a bug, try to replicate it with the latest beta (or stable).
The update instructions are available at https://rclone.org/commands/rclone_selfupdate/

If you can still replicate it or just got a question then please use the rclone forum:

    https://forum.rclone.org/

for a quick response instead of filing an issue on this repo.

If nothing else helps, then please fill in the info below which helps us help you.

**DO NOT REDACT** any information except passwords/keys/personal info.

You should use 3 backticks to begin and end your paste to make it readable.

Make sure to include a log obtained with '-vv'.

You can also use '-vv --log-file bug.log' and a service such as https://pastebin.com or https://gist.github.com/

Thank you

The Rclone Developers

-->

#### The associated forum post URL from `https://forum.rclone.org`

N/A

#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?

The transferred bytes reported during and after a sync/copy includes those of server-side moves. See for example this excerpt from a JSON log:

```json
{"level":"warning","msg":"\nTransferred:   \t          0 B / 0 B, -, 0 B/s, ETA -\nElapsed time:         4.0s\n\n","source":"accounting/stats.go:482","stats":{"bytes":0,"checks":0,"deletedDirs":0,"deletes":0,"elapsedTime":4.050360584,"errors":0,"eta":null,"fatalError":false,"renames":0,"retryError":false,"speed":0,"totalBytes":0,"totalChecks":0,"totalTransfers":0,"transferTime":0,"transfers":0},"time":"2023-03-15T00:19:09.288221+01:00"}
{"level":"warning","msg":"Skipped move as --dry-run is set (size 3.951Ki)","object":".config/mc/ini","objectType":"*crypt.Object","size":4046,"skipped":"move","source":"operations/operations.go:2358","time":"2023-03-15T00:19:09.746281+01:00"}
{"level":"warning","msg":"Skipped copy as --dry-run is set (size 3.952Ki)","object":".config/mc/ini","objectType":"*local.Object","size":4047,"skipped":"copy","source":"operations/operations.go:2358","time":"2023-03-15T00:19:09.746497+01:00"}
{"level":"warning","msg":"Skipped move as --dry-run is set (size 35)","object":".config/mcd/.cache/mc/Tree","objectType":"*crypt.Object","size":35,"skipped":"move","source":"operations/operations.go:2358","time":"2023-03-15T00:19:09.998109+01:00"}
{"level":"warning","msg":"Skipped copy as --dry-run is set (size 35)","object":".config/mcd/.cache/mc/Tree","objectType":"*local.Object","size":35,"skipped":"copy","source":"operations/operations.go:2358","time":"2023-03-15T00:19:09.998176+01:00"}
{"level":"warning","msg":"Skipped move as --dry-run is set (size 450)","object":"Tools/rclone-develop/backups.toml","objectType":"*crypt.Object","size":450,"skipped":"move","source":"operations/operations.go:2358","time":"2023-03-15T00:19:10.254098+01:00"}
{"level":"warning","msg":"Skipped copy as --dry-run is set (size 442)","object":"Tools/rclone-develop/backups.toml","objectType":"*local.Object","size":442,"skipped":"copy","source":"operations/operations.go:2358","time":"2023-03-15T00:19:10.254234+01:00"}
{"level":"warning","msg":"\nTransferred:   \t    8.843 KiB / 8.843 KiB, 100%, 0 B/s, ETA -\nChecks:                 6 / 14, 43%\nRenamed:                3\nTransferred:            3 / 3, 100%\nElapsed time:         5.0s\nChecking:\n *                       .local/share/mc/history: checking\n *           .config/mcd/.local/share/mc/history: checking\n * Tools/rclone/.git/workdevelop/COMMIT_EDITMSG: checking\n * Tools/rclone/.git/work-develop/fork-settings: checking\n * Tools/rclone/.git/works/rclone-develop/index: checking\n *          Tools/rclone/.git/refs/heads/develop: checking\n * Tools/rclone/.git/worklone-develop/logs/HEAD: checking\n *     Tools/rclone/.git/logs/refs/heads/develop: checking\n\n","source":"accounting/stats.go:482","stats":{"bytes":9055,"checking":[".local/share/mc/history",".config/mcd/.local/share/mc/history","Tools/rclone/.git/worktrees/rclone-develop/COMMIT_EDITMSG","Tools/rclone/.git/worktrees/rclone-develop/fork-settings","Tools/rclone/.git/worktrees/rclone-develop/index","Tools/rclone/.git/refs/heads/develop","Tools/rclone/.git/worktrees/rclone-develop/logs/HEAD","Tools/rclone/.git/logs/refs/heads/develop"],"checks":6,"deletedDirs":0,"deletes":0,"elapsedTime":5.050173875,"errors":0,"eta":null,"fatalError":false,"renames":3,"retryError":false,"speed":0,"totalBytes":9055,"totalChecks":14,"totalTransfers":3,"transferTime":0,"transfers":3},"time":"2023-03-15T00:19:10.288089+01:00"}
```

I also verified this without `--dry-run`:

```
$ rclone copy --log-level INFO rclone.svg  "crypt:"
2023/03/15 00:46:55 INFO  : rclone.svg: Copied (new)
2023/03/15 00:46:55 INFO  :
Transferred:   	    2.339 KiB / 2.339 KiB, 100%, 0 B/s, ETA -
Transferred:            1 / 1, 100%
Elapsed time:         0.6s

$ touch rclone.svg
$ rclone copy --log-level INFO --backup-dir "crypt:bak" rclone.svg  "
crypt:"
2023/03/15 00:47:10 INFO  : rclone.svg: Deleted
2023/03/15 00:47:10 INFO  : rclone.svg: Moved (server-side)
2023/03/15 00:47:10 INFO  : rclone.svg: Copied (new)
2023/03/15 00:47:10 INFO  :
Transferred:   	    4.631 KiB / 4.631 KiB, 100%, 0 B/s, ETA -
Checks:                 2 / 2, 100%
Deleted:                1 (files), 0 (dirs)
Renamed:                1
Transferred:            1 / 1, 100%
Elapsed time:         1.4s
```

#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)

rclone 1.61.1
- os/version: darwin 12.6.3 (64 bit)
- os/kernel: 21.6.0 (arm64)
- os/type: darwin
- os/arch: arm64
- go/version: go1.19.5
- go/linking: dynamic
- go/tags: cmount

#### Which cloud storage system are you using? (e.g. Google Drive)

pCloud

#### The command you were trying to run (e.g. `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

```
rclone sync --use-json-log --fast-list --links --track-renames --track-renames-strategy modtime,leaf --retries 1 --exclude-from /Users/brechtm/Tools/rclone-develop/brechtm.exclude --dry-run --stats 1s /Users/brechtm crypt:Backup/MacBook/Users/brechtm/lates
```

#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (e.g. output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

See above.

<!--- Please keep the note below for others who read your bug report. -->

#### How to use GitHub

* Please use the  [reaction](https://blog.github.com/2016-03-10-add-reactions-to-pull-requests-issues-and-comments/) to show that you are affected by the same issue.
* Please don't comment if you have no relevant information to add. It's just extra noise for everyone subscribed to this issue.
* Subscribe to receive notifications on status change and new comments.
